titleStmt.title: The praise of saylors here set forth, with the hard fortunes which do befall them on the seas, when land men sleep safe on their beds. To a pleasant new tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and W. Gilbertson.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
